original_text: The contribution of the king from his own possessions was for the burnt offerings: the burnt offerings of morning and evening, and the burnt offerings for the Sabbaths, the new moons, and the appointed feasts, as it is written in the Law of the Lord.
korean_text: 또 왕의 재산 중에서 얼마를 정하여 여호와의 율법에 기록된 대로 번제 곧 아침과 저녁의 번제와 안식일과 초하루와 절기의 번제에 쓰게 하고

sentences.original_text: The contribution of the king from his own possessions
the burnt offerings of morning and evening,
and the burnt offerings for the Sabbaths,
as it is written in the Law of the Lord.
